original_text: This is the portion of the food offerings presented to the Lord that were allotted to Aaron and his sons on the day they were presented to serve the Lord as priests.
korean_text: 이는 여호와의 화제물 중에서 아론에게 돌릴 것과 그의 아들들에게 돌릴 것이니 그들을 세워 여호와의 제사장의 직분을 행하게 한 날

sentences.original_text: This is the portion of the food offerings
that were allotted to Aaron and his sons
on the day they were presented
to serve the Lord as priests
